name: Bernd's Biscuits
description:
Let the Baking begin!  Fill Bernd with pride

Poor Bernd needs your help. Until Christmas, 24 different recipes must be prepared in his bakery to keep up with the family tradition. Unfortunately, he's lost track of time and now desperately needs some baking support to reach his goal. Apparently, he is busy with other things himself....

How to play

Each recipe requires certain ingredients, which are transported on conveyor belts. Each of these ingredients is defined by three properties - consistency, color and taste. Use machines to alter the ingredients’ properties and provide the components your recipe needs.

Machines can be moved within the conveyor belts and altered in their type. But beware: Some machines can be limited to a certain position or type.

This magical little Christmas baking puzzle game was made by two cookie junkies and lovingly handcrafted from graphical asset preparation to music composition to coding. Made by cookie lovers for cookie lovers - with Pixi.js.
